snippet: North and South Korea agreed to allow factory managers from the South to return to a jointly operated industrial park in the North for the first time in two months.
abstract: North and South Korea agree to allow factory managers from South to return to jointly operated industrial park in North in sign of easing tensions after months of hostile exchanges; officials from both countries will meet again to discuss terms of reopening complex.
lead_paragraph: North and South Korea agreed to allow factory managers from the South to return to a jointly operated industrial park in the North for the first time in two months.

headline.main: Korean Pact on Factories Could Lead to Reopening
headline.print_headline: Korean Pact On Factories Could Lead To Reopening
